playn.core

Class AbstractCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.AbstractCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Canvas
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCanvasGL

    public abstract class AbstractCanvas
extends Object
implements Canvas
    A base Canvas implementation shared by all platforms.
